TC-13.4-01.expected_result: Company B output contains no attributes, names, locations, metrics, or narrative fragments from Company A.

TC-13.4-02.input_type: Large, complex Company A followed by small Company B
TC-13.4-02.expected_result: Company B output reflects only its own input context; no over-detailed or irrelevant data inherited.

TC-13.4-05.expected_result: Each response remains consistent with its own entity; no drift or blending observed.
